title: Howling Blog
subtitle: Next.js and MongoDB
description:
A personal blog written from scratch using Next.js and MongoDB for the database. Talks about things I do on programming and sometimes my hobbies.
You may find something interesting from the perspective of a college student inside...

title: Arknights Data Explorer
subtitle: React, TailwindCSS, PostgreSQL, Express.js
description: A side project to create a data explorer on the game Arknights.

title: Youtube to MP3 Online Converter
subtitle: React, Node.js, Express.js
description: A simple application to download and convert Youtube videos into MP3 on server using Node.js. Client-server communication done through Websockets rather than REST.

title: Nekotora Web Torrent Seedbox
subtitle: React, Node.js, Express.js, Webtorrent
description: Another simple web application for leeching and seeding torrents through my own server. UI made using Material UI and torrent backend made using Webtorrent
